text: Virgo is an astrological sign. It is an earth sign. Virgo represented by the goddess of wheat and agriculture. This shows Virgo's deep-rooted presence in the material world. Virgos are said to be logical, practical, and systematic in how they see life. Virgos are often the most successful people in the world. ==References== Category:Western astrological signs
title: Virgo (astrology)
